import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import * as Components from './Components'; function Home() { const [signIn, toggle] = React.useState(true); const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* Background Video */}
{/* Main Login & Signup UI */} Create Account navigate('/upload')}> Sign Up Sign In Forgot your password? Sign In Welcome Back! To keep connected with us please login with your personal info toggle(true)}> Sign In Hello, Friend! Enter Your personal details and start your journey with us toggle(false)}> Sign Up
); } export default Home;
